mapper.insert: insert into dt_equipment_info ( parent_node_code, equipment_code, equipment_name, equipment_type, equipment_property_template_code, equipment_property_code, keyword, data_val, alarm_val, control_val )values ( #{equipment_info.parent_node_code}, #{equipment_info.equipment_code}, #{equipment_info.equipment_name}, #{equipment_info.equipment_type}, #{equipment_info.equipment_property_template_code}, #{equipment_info.equipment_property_code}, #{equipment_info.keyword}, #{equipment_info.data_val}, #{equipment_info.alarm_val}, #{equipment_info.control_val} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE dt_equipment_info
parent_node_code = #{equipment_info.parent_node_code},
equipment_code = #{equipment_info.equipment_code},
equipment_name = #{equipment_info.equipment_name},
equipment_type = #{equipment_info.equipment_type},
equipment_property_template_code = #{equipment_info.equipment_property_template_code},
equipment_property_code = #{equipment_info.equipment_property_code},
keyword = #{equipment_info.keyword},
data_val = #{equipment_info.data_val},
alarm_val = #{equipment_info.alarm_val},
control_val = #{equipment_info.control_val},
update_time = #{equipment_info.update_time},
params_update = #{equipment_info.params_update},
data_update = #{equipment_info.data_update},
alarm_update = #{equipment_info.alarm_update},
controller_update = #{equipment_info.controller_update},
WHERE id=#{equipment_info.id}
mapper.select: select * from dt_equipment_info order by id
